languages.text: {n}Она хрупка, но в ней чувствуется сила. И право приказывать, уясненное и принимаемое как должное. Она готова повелевать, потому что за таких дев, прекрасных и решительных, готовы умирать целые легионы. У нее в руке нет знамени, ибо она сама — знамя.{/n}

{n}She is fragile, but there is a strength in her, an authority, taken for granted and understood by everyone. She is clearly ready to command, with legions willing to die for such maidens, beautiful and resolute as they are. She carries no banner in her hand, for she herself is the banner.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Она хрупка, но в ней чувствуется сила. И право приказывать, уясненное и принимаемое как должное. Она готова повелевать, потому что за таких дев, прекрасных и решительных, готовы умирать целые легионы. У нее в руке нет знамени, ибо она сама — знамя.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}She is fragile, but there is a strength in her. And the authority, taken for granted and understood by everyone. She is ready to command, because legions are willing to die for such maidens, beautiful and resolute. She has no banner in her hand, for she herself is the banner.{/n}

{n}She is fragile, but there is a strength in her. And the authority, taken for granted and understood by everyone. She is ready to command, because legions are willing to die for such maidens, beautiful and resolute. She has no banner in her hand, for she herself is the banner.{/n}

{n}She is fragile, but there is a strength in her, an authority, taken for granted and understood by everyone. She is clearly ready to command, with legions willing to die for such maidens, beautiful and resolute as they are. She carries no banner in her hand, for she herself is the banner.{/n}

{n}She is fragile, but there is a strength in her, an authority, taken for granted and understood by everyone. She is clearly ready to command, with legions willing to die for such maidens, beautiful and resolute as they are. She carries no banner in her hand, for she herself is the banner.{/n}

{n}She is fragile, but there is a strength in her, an authority, taken for granted and understood by everyone. She is clearly ready to command, with legions willing to die for such maidens, beautiful and resolute as they are. She carries no banner in her hand, for she herself is the banner.{/n}

{n}She is fragile, but there is a strength in her, an authority, taken for granted and understood by everyone. She is clearly ready to command, with legions willing to die for such maidens, beautiful and resolute as they are. She carries no banner in her hand, for she herself is the banner.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sie wirkt zerbrechlich, aber in ihr ist eine Stärke, eine Autorität, die jeder akzeptiert und versteht. Sie ist offensichtlich bereit, zu befehligen, und Legionen würden für derartige Maiden sterben, so schön und entschlossen sind sie. Sie trägt kein Banner in der Hand, denn sie selbst ist das Banner.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She is fragile, but there is a strength in her, an authority, taken for granted and understood by everyone. She is clearly ready to command, with legions willing to die for such maidens, beautiful and resolute as they are. She carries no banner in her hand, for she herself is the banner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie wirkt zerbrechlich, aber in ihr ist eine Stärke, eine Autorität, die jeder akzeptiert und versteht. Sie ist offensichtlich bereit, zu befehligen, und Legionen würden für derartige Maiden sterben, so schön und entschlossen sind sie. Sie trägt kein Banner in der Hand, denn sie selbst ist das Banner.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es frágil, pero tiene una fuerza y autoridad que los demás aceptan y comprenden. Es evidente que está lista para dar órdenes, y hay legiones dispuestas a morir por estas doncellas hermosas y determinadas. No porta ningún estandarte, pues ella misma es el estandarte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She is fragile, but there is a strength in her, an authority, taken for granted and understood by everyone. She is clearly ready to command, with legions willing to die for such maidens, beautiful and resolute as they are. She carries no banner in her hand, for she herself is the banner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es frágil, pero tiene una fuerza y autoridad que los demás aceptan y comprenden. Es evidente que está lista para dar órdenes, y hay legiones dispuestas a morir por estas doncellas hermosas y determinadas. No porta ningún estandarte, pues ella misma es el estandarte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}女は華奢だが力強さと威厳があり、誰からも認められて理解されている。どう見ても指揮を執る準備は万端で、美しく毅然とし、そんな彼女のためなら死も厭わない軍団がそばに付いている。女が旗を手に持っているわけではなく、彼女自身が旗なのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She is fragile, but there is a strength in her, an authority, taken for granted and understood by everyone. She is clearly ready to command, with legions willing to die for such maidens, beautiful and resolute as they are. She carries no banner in her hand, for she herself is the banner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}女は華奢だが力強さと威厳があり、誰からも認められて理解されている。どう見ても指揮を執る準備は万端で、美しく毅然とし、そんな彼女のためなら死も厭わない軍団がそばに付いている。女が旗を手に持っているわけではなく、彼女自身が旗なのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}她看起来很脆弱，但她身上带着某种力量，某种权威。所有人都能理解她的权威，认为这一切理所当然。很显然，她已经做好了指挥众人的准备，而她的军团愿意为了像她这样美丽、坚定的少女献出生命。她手中并没有高举旗帜，因为她本人就是旗帜。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She is fragile, but there is a strength in her, an authority, taken for granted and understood by everyone. She is clearly ready to command, with legions willing to die for such maidens, beautiful and resolute as they are. She carries no banner in her hand, for she herself is the banner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}她看起来很脆弱，但她身上带着某种力量，某种权威。所有人都能理解她的权威，认为这一切理所当然。很显然，她已经做好了指挥众人的准备，而她的军团愿意为了像她这样美丽、坚定的少女献出生命。她手中并没有高举旗帜，因为她本人就是旗帜。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Elle est fragile, mais recèle une force intérieure, une autorité allant de soi et que tout le monde comprend. Elle est manifestement prête à commander. Des légions entières seraient prêtes à se sacrifier pour la beauté et la détermination d'une telle jeune femme. Elle ne brandit aucune bannière, car elle incarne elle-même la bannière.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She is fragile, but there is a strength in her, an authority, taken for granted and understood by everyone. She is clearly ready to command, with legions willing to die for such maidens, beautiful and resolute as they are. She carries no banner in her hand, for she herself is the banner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle est fragile, mais recèle une force intérieure, une autorité allant de soi et que tout le monde comprend. Elle est manifestement prête à commander. Des légions entières seraient prêtes à se sacrifier pour la beauté et la détermination d'une telle jeune femme. Elle ne brandit aucune bannière, car elle incarne elle-même la bannière.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kırılgan görünse de içinde bir kuvvet yatıyor. Herkesin hafife aldığı ve kavradığı bir otoritesi var. Böylesine güzel ve kararlı genç kadınlar uğruna ölmeyi göze almış lejyonlara hükmetmeye hazır olduğu aşikâr. Elinde hiçbir sancak taşımıyor. Çünkü o, sancağın ta kendisi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She is fragile, but there is a strength in her, an authority, taken for granted and understood by everyone. She is clearly ready to command, with legions willing to die for such maidens, beautiful and resolute as they are. She carries no banner in her hand, for she herself is the banner.{/n}
